TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocumentWriter extends System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter

Docs.summary: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 有没有构造函数。 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>，使用静态<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>类，或使用某个静态<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>方法的<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>类。 文档或创建队列<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>成为将写入到目标。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> 类的实例。
[!code-csharp[XpsSave#CreateXpsDocumentWriter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpsSaveHelper.cs#createxpsdocumentwriter)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#CreateXpsDocumentWriter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpssavehelper.vb#createxpsdocumentwriter)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>将写入到同一目标<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>作为<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>创建<xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>。
此方法不会验证或修改指定`documentPrintTicket`为特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。 如有必要，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>特定于<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>和有效对指定的打印机。

Docs.summary: Writes synchronously to an XPS document or print queue.

Docs.param: The path of the source document.
Docs.summary: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>类具有单数名称，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一组多个文档。 此方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>到集的源中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>目标中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。
这<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>方法将重新序列化指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，这将删除所有内容从<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。
根据设计，此<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>方法不会调用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Write (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void Write(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub Write (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void Write(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.Write : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

Docs.param: The path of the source document.
An indication of whether notification is enabled.
Docs.summary: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当`notificationLevel`处于禁用状态，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>将复制的序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]到目标文档<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>创建<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>。 当`notificationLevel`已启用，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>首先反序列化文档，再对其，重新，然后输出每个页时将其写入到目标的进度通知。
尽管<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>类具有单数名称，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一组多个文档。 此方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>中的源序列的元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>目标中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。
如果`notificationLevel`指定为<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>，仅当文档序列化时，不会打印时生成通知。 若要接收的通知文档必须重新序列。 文档时重新序列中的所有内容<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范 (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)中删除。 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。
如果`notificationLevel`指定为<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled>文档将不会重新序列化并扩展的任何内容将被保留，即使在打印时。
根据设计，此<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>方法不会调用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。

public: override void Write(System::Windows::Documents::DocumentPaginator ^ documentPaginator, System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ printTicket);
override this.Write : System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator * System.Printing.PrintTicket -> unit

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteAsync (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void WriteAsync(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub WriteAsync (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void WriteAsync(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.WriteAsync : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

Docs.param: The path of the source document.
An indication of whether notification is enabled.
Docs.summary: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当`notificationLevel`处于禁用状态，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>将复制的序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]到目标文档<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>创建<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>。 当`notificationLevel`已启用，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>首先反序列化文档，再对其，重新，然后输出每个页时将其写入到目标的进度通知。
尽管<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>类具有单数名称，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一组多个文档。 此方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>中的源序列的元素<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>目标中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。
如果`notificationLevel`指定为<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationEnabled>，仅当文档序列化时，不会打印时生成通知。 若要接收的通知文档必须重新序列。 文档时重新序列中的所有内容<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)中删除。 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。
如果`notificationLevel`指定为<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel.ReceiveNotificationDisabled>文档将不会重新序列化并扩展的任何内容将被保留，即使在打印时。
根据设计，此<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>方法不会调用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件。

## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> 一组文档异步写入到<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>创建<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>。 写入的数据包括<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>和调用方想要传递到事件处理程序的其他信息。
尽管<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>类具有单数名称，<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>可以是一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一组多个文档。 此方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或一组<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>现有序列的元素。
此方法不会验证或修改指定`printTicket`为特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。 如有必要，使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>特定于<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>，对于指定打印机无效。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted> 事件。
[!code-csharp[XpsSave#WritingEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/CSharp/XpsSaveHelper.cs#writingevents)] [!code-vb[XpsSave#WritingEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsSave/visualbasic/xpssavehelper.vb#writingevents)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override event System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler WritingPrintTicketRequired;
.event class System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler WritingPrintTicketRequired
Public Overrides Custom Event WritingPrintTicketRequired As WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler
public: override event System::Windows::Documents::Serialization::WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler ^ WritingPrintTicketRequired;
member this.WritingPrintTicketRequired : System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler

Docs.summary: Occurs just before a or method adds a to a document or print queue.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> 使事件处理程序替换为新<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>为传递到写入操作。
以下四种<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>并<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>方法的确调用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>事件：
- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>（字符串）
- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(String，XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>（字符串）
- <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String，XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
